name: Brand
description:
Retrieves a specific Brand by its ID.
## Response body example

```json
{
  "id": 7000000,
  "name": "Pedigree",
  "isActive": true,
  "title": "Pedigree",
  "metaTagDescription": "Pedigree",
  "imageUrl": null
}
```

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$ul: **isActive**: Defines if the brand is active (`true`) or not (`false`).

**metaTagDescription**: Meta Description for the Brand page. A brief description of the brand, displayed by search engines. Since search engines can only display less than 150 characters, we recommend not exceeding this character limit when creating the description.
**title**: Meta Title for the Brand page.
